game.name: Space Ripper
game.description:
You are going to enter a space that is invaded by a plenty of enemy spacecrafts. Luckily, you also have a wonderful spacecraft equipped with lots of ammo and weapons. Take your seat on your spacecraft and get ready to clean your area from the uninvited deadly souls in Space Ripper! This war is not going to be easy at all as your enemies are also equally strong and would destroy your area if you delay in taking your position.  Get ready to show off your best action moves in this original hardcore space shooter!

Nobody can save you except your courageous and intense shooting skills in this cool html5 action game. And, you are surrounded by a little HP and a huge horde of blood-thirsty enemies. Your survival for 5 minutes will be enough to make you the biggest arcade God on this planet. Press the yellow button for weapon upgrade and green for extra health. Completing every mission successfully will help you to grab some points through which you can upgrade your weapons and character as well. 

You have to pay different amount to repair and upgrade you and things you have to carry, including Drone Repair, Red Laser, Wings, Green Laser, Engine, Minigun, Lightening, Blue Laser and more. If you lose your game, there will two options to choose from â€“ play again or return to dock. Move your character through WASD or arrow keys, shoot through the LMB or use the shield through RMB! Use the death ray using the space key and press Esc to pause and explore other useful options in this one of the best shooting games for kids! Have fun without download in this exciting arcade space shooter!
